title: THIS IS WHY YOU NEED TO GIVE YASUO A CHANCE!
body:
{{champion:222}} Someone help me!

{{champion:157}} {{champion:254}} WE'RE COMING!

{{champion:222}} **NOT YOU GUYS!** 


https://67.media.tumblr.com/6f39f13a9043cae9be4f39eda2348205/tumblr_nkfunvuNfZ1sdk5d7o1_r2_500.gif

{{champion:222}} ....

{{champion:201}} ....Sorry Jinx...

{{champion:127}} *whips her hair back without a care in the world*

{{champion:254}} The one time I was going to save you to.....

{{champion:157}} I'm just going to leave, to split push..... ~~And I might comeback~~

replies.body: One ult for 3 flashes and a kill? Super worth.
{{champion:222}}: GG report noob team, not saving me

League competence at its finest.
:P
I mean they all tried thus failed. Had 1 of them not tried to save jinx with a flash or jinx just not flashed she would have lived.

Ace in the hole cooldown: 90 seconds
Windwall cooldown: 26 seconds
Unbreakable cooldown: 18 seconds
Flash cooldown: 300 seconds
This team: Worthless.

omg ur sch a dun key kopy
{{champion:51}} Hmmm. Nu-Uh she knew what was coming.
Rest in pepperoni
If Jinx had not flashed, she would have lived.
I believe that was the joke, if she had faith in Yasuo his wall would have protected her, and if it somehow missed Vi would've taken it for her, probably would have died, but still save Jinx.
If yasuo leveled his w a second time in lane she would been fine

> [{quoted}](name=Chocolate Frost,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=g4VE4APE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-10-23T18:28:52.443+0000)
>
> If Jinx had not flashed, she would have lived.

I think she saw it was going to hit vi so she flashed it
lmao
Great, now Yasuo feels guilty for his brother _and_ Jinx...

An entire team unable to help anyone out?!?!?!?!

Sounds like my B1-S5 promo.
actually yas would have saved her had she not flashed after he did. She killed herself for flashing.
Oh no... oh no, now caits gonna get that +1 extra gold D:

Okay so I'll mention what everyone forgot to. Notice this video is slow mo. Probably at 0.75. Yas, Vi and Jinx pressed their flash button MILLISECONDS apart. This means Jinx probably didn't know Yas and Vi would flash until it was too late. I get it was meant to be funny and it is. I just want people to know that Jinx wasn't at fault.
I feel like if Vi blocked it, she would have died instead
I have a feeling she wasnt trying to block it but was trying to flash behind the wind wall to live

Probably this ^ she saw that Jinx wasn't standing behind Yasuo and was actually trying to move behind Vi, which would have gotten Vi killed. That might even be why Braum tried to E; for the Vi, not the Jinx.

People hiding from Jhin ult and Cait ult and are not currently being chased need to STOP FUCKING FLASHING dude I'm right here, literally right here, you don't need to flash away from me to get hit by dumb shit

Had an ARAM game as Maokai where our Veigar got mad at me for not blocking a Jhin ult for him. He calmed down immediately when another player pointed out that I'd literally popped my ult the moment Jhin did, and that I was standing still in a place that let me tank for the entire team if they would just take two steps to the left.
The amount of times that's happened to me is depressing.
If {{champion:222}}  didn't{{summoner:4}} she wouldv'e lived
if jinx not flast she {{summoner:4}}survival{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Keep calm and stay still.
yeah sure totally wasn't because jinx flashed and got herself killed
Kinda wondering what did Braum's shield even block if Jinx was already hit.
Mostly Jinx's fault though. Flash or not she just just move down and survive.
xD OMG jinx main
